text: Our government has kept us in a perpetual state of fear - kept us in a continuous stampede of patriotic fervor - with the cry of grave national emergency.
author: Douglas MacArthur

text: Patriotism is the willingness to kill and be killed for trivial reasons.
author: Bertrand Russell

text: Patriotism is usually stronger than class hatred, and always stronger than internationalism.
author: George Orwell

text: Patriotism is the last refuge of the scoundrel.
author: Samuel Johnson

text: Dissent is the highest form of patriotism.
author: Howard Zinn
